availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kentucky soldier. Served in the 4th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as 1st Corporal from October 9, 1861 to o. Captured in Georgia by Confederate forces on July 30, 1864 and escaped at Columbia, South Carolina in November 1864.

ab.bibl:
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 192.
Find A Grave, "Thomas P. Young Jr. (Nov 18, 1844-Oct 13, 1865)," Memorial #59848280, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/59848280 (accessed June 23, 2020).
